early.text: Roswell UFO Museum gift shop has incredible deals! Do you stock up?

choices.message: You stock up on UFO detection gear! Having proper equipment calms your nerves.
You look around without buying. Still inspiring to be at ground zero!

early.text: Local tells you about a crash site nobody talks about. Worth investigating?

choices.message: You find strange metal fragments! This could be evidence! But... what if someone sees you?
You make a note and continue on. You'll come back... right?

early.text: A black SUV has been following you for miles. Government?

choices.message: You got photos of the tail! But now they DEFINITELY know you're onto them...

choices.text: ğŸš— Lose them on back roads
choices.message: You take random turns for an hour. Finally lost them! You can breathe again.
Act natural. Act natural. They eventually turn off. Your hands are still shaking...

early.text: You meet another truth seeker at a diner. They offer to trade evidence!

choices.message: These documents are INCREDIBLE! You traded some gas and equipment for solid intel. Nice to meet someone who understands.
They appreciate your generosity and share some files! You're not in this alone!
Trust no one. You politely decline and leave.

early.text: Strange lights in the sky! They move in patterns no aircraft can!

choices.message: Witnessing the impossible! You got it on camera! But... are they watching YOU?
You watch in stunned silence. Something extraordinary is happening... The truth is out there.

choices.text: ğŸš— Get out of here fast
choices.message: You flee the area! What if they saw you? Your heart is pounding...

early.text: Gas station attendant: 'You're not the first to come through here...'

choices.text: â“ Ask what happened to the others
choices.message: 'Most turn back. Some... we never see again.' Chilling. What have you gotten yourself into?
They mark safe routes on your map. Helpful!

early.text: You find an abandoned research facility. Fence is cut open...

choices.message: You find classified documents! This is HUGE! Used equipment to scan and photograph everything! But... what if they know someone was here?
You snap some pics and get out. Smart. Good evidence collected!
You drive away. But you'll always wonder...

middle.text: Massive lights over the desert! Moving in impossible patterns!

choices.message: YOU GOT IT ON CAMERA! This is undeniable proof! But now you KNOW... they're real...
You witness something extraordinary. Changed forever. The implications are terrifying...
You follow for miles! Got some footage before they vanished! What if they noticed you?!

middle.text: Former base worker approaches: 'I can tell you what I saw...'

choices.message: Their testimony is EXPLOSIVE! Worth every penny! Recording everything!
You decline. Can't be too careful...

middle.text: Car breaks down in the desert. While waiting, you notice strange ground markings...

choices.message: These patterns are NOT natural! Landing site? Your camera shutter won't stop clicking...
You call a tow truck and get moving again.

middle.text: You intercept military radio chatter. Coordinates to a... cargo transfer?

choices.message: You witness unmarked trucks! Got photos before they spotted you! DID THEY SEE YOU?!
The audio alone is valuable evidence! Encrypted coordinates, call signs, everything! But... can they trace radio intercepts?
You delete the recording. Safer that way...

middle.text: Sheriff pulls you over: 'Turn back while you still can, son.'

choices.message: 'Just sightseeing, officer.' They let you go with a warning.
Their nervous response tells you EVERYTHING. But now they know WHO you are...
'Headed to Vegas!' They buy it. You relax a bit knowing your cover is solid.

middle.text: Crashed military drone in the desert! SD card still intact!

choices.message: JACKPOT! This is MAJOR evidence! But... stealing military property? What have you done?!
choices.failMessage: You take the drone but cops show up! You drop it and run!

choices.message: Smart! You got the data without the legal risk! Still... they'll know someone accessed it.
Too risky. You walk away, but doubt creeps in...

middle.text: Your phone is acting weird. Apps opening randomly. Surveillance?

choices.message: Can't track what doesn't exist! Smart move! You feel safer already.
Lost some data but phone works normally now. But... what if they already got what they needed?
Nothing to hide anyway, right? Every notification makes you jump now.

middle.text: Same car has been behind you for 50 miles. Different driver each time you check...

choices.message: You lose them with sudden turns! Heart pounding but you're clear!
Got photos of the license plate! But they DEFINITELY know you noticed...
You keep driving normally. Hands white-knuckling the steering wheel...

middle.text: Pulled over by unmarked car. The 'officer' has no badge visible...

choices.message: You film the whole encounter! They let you go but... that wasn't normal.
choices.failMessage: They confiscate your phone! All recent footage gone!

choices.message: You answer minimally. They circle your RV... taking notes... then let you go.
You floor it! Now you're fleeing from... who exactly?! Was that legal?!

middle.text: You notice the same person in three different towns. Always watching...

choices.message: They vanish when you approach! Who ARE these people?!
choices.failMessage: They confront YOU! 'Stop digging or else.' Then disappear into crowd...

choices.message: You take back roads. Adds time but... you lost them.
Sketches, times, locations... you're building a case. But they're DEFINITELY tracking you.

middle.text: Hotel TV turns on by itself. Security camera feed. YOUR room number visible...

choices.message: You grab your stuff and RUN! Drive all night! Forfeited the deposit!
They find nothing. 'Electrical malfunction.' But you sleep with one eye open...
choices.failMessage: The cops take a report... but you notice them radioing someone. They're IN ON IT!

choices.message: You move to your RV in the parking lot. Safer. More mobile.

middle.text: Your credit card gets declined. Bank says 'government hold on account...'

choices.message: Can't track cash! You feel safer knowing they can't monitor your spending anymore.
'Computer error.' Sure it was. After an hour they 'fix' it.
Works for now... but how long until they freeze that one too?

middle.text: Drone hovering outside your motel window at 3 AM...

choices.message: Got footage! Evidence of harassment! It flies off when you point your camera...
You throw something at it! It crashes! You grab the SD card and memory! But... destruction of property? They might press charges!
You hide inside. The buzzing continues for hours... watching... waiting...

late.text: 3 AM. Camping near the perimeter. MASSIVE lights appear over the base!

choices.message: THE MONEY SHOT! Incredible evidence! But security is responding... ARE THEY COMING FOR YOU?!
Some things cameras can't capture. You'll never forget this. Mental notes aren't as strong as hard evidence, but the memory is burned into your mind...
You're paralyzed with fear. The lights eventually fade.

late.text: Men in suits at your motel. NDA and a briefcase of cash...

choices.message: You signed. Game over. They take all your evidence. The truth dies with your signature.
'I'm not for sale.' They leave. For now.
Got it all on tape! This is incredible evidence! But... they definitely noticed. Lawyer fees incoming.
choices.failMessage: They caught you recording! Evidence confiscated and threatened with legal action!

late.text: Researcher shares coordinates to a hidden entrance. Too scared to use it...

choices.message: HOLY... You saw things. THINGS. You documented EVERYTHING! You can't unsee this. WHAT HAVE THEY BEEN DOING?!
You share the coordinates with the truth-seeking community! You lose exclusive access, but the collective will uncover more than you could alone!
Someone paid BIG. Your conscience... not so big.

late.text: Convoy of unmarked trucks entering the base. Huge covered cargo!

choices.message: You got close! TOO close! Got incredible footage! Security is responding! THEY SAW YOU!
Telephoto lens FTW! Great evidence, stayed safe! But... what were they transporting?
Coward. But alive. The internal debate rages...

late.text: Your documentary is ready. Upload now or wait for more evidence?

choices.message: IT'S OUT THERE! Going viral! Evidence uploaded to the world! You did it!
Need more evidence. Just a bit more...
CNN paid well! Your evidence airs tomorrow!

late.text: Crash site! Debris unlike anything you've seen. Still warm to touch!

choices.message: PHYSICAL EVIDENCE! You've got actual alien materials! This is HUGE! Used some equipment to collect samples.
Photos and measurements. Great evidence, safer than theft!
You call it in and leave. Someone else's problem now.

late.text: BASE SECURITY SPOTTED YOU! Alarms! Searchlights! MOVE!

choices.message: FLOOR IT! You escape but barely! Heart pounding!
Detained. Interrogated. Evidence confiscated. Released with warnings.
Hours in the desert. Finally safe. Traumatic.

late.text: {{partyMember}} doubts: 'This is too intense. Maybe we should go home.'

choices.message: 'You're right. We're SO close!' {{partyMember}} is back in!
{{partyMember}} catches a bus home. You continue alone...
'We didn't come this far to quit!' Tension rises with {{partyMember}}...

late.text: ROADBLOCK! Federal agents checking vehicles. They look serious...

choices.message: Suspicious U-turn but you get away! They radioed it in though...
Just a tourist! They wave you through. Close call!
choices.failMessage: They search your vehicle! Found some of your files and equipment! They confiscate it!

choices.message: You dump your most incriminating evidence. Better safe than sorry!

late.text: Black helicopter circling your position. They KNOW you're here...

choices.message: You drop some evidence files while running! But you escape!
Got footage of military harassment! This is solid evidence! They leave eventually. Your hands won't stop shaking...
choices.failMessage: They land and confiscate important evidence! Detained for hours!

choices.message: Hours hiding in the desert. Finally they leave. Brutal.

late.text: 'FBI. We need to talk.' They're at your motel room door...

choices.message: They confiscate some evidence 'for national security.' You're free to go... for now.
You flee! Lost your motel deposit but kept your evidence!
choices.failMessage: They catch you climbing out! Important evidence seized AND arrested!

choices.message: You hand over copies, keep originals hidden. They're satisfied... for now.

late.text: Military police at gas station. They're questioning everyone...

choices.message: You drive off before they notice. Running on fumes though...
'Just passing through.' They seem to believe you.
choices.failMessage: They check your vehicle! Found some of your equipment and documents! They confiscate it!

choices.message: You wipe your camera cards and delete files. Safe but... was it worth it?
